entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
